adDetails: Private party with cash ready will provide Private funding for new construction and rehab of residential properties. The property must be located in the bay area. I can lend up to 75 or even 80 % of ARV. 2nd or 3rd loan are OK. Investor must have experience!. Please email basic information about your need / request. NO information on your deal no response. Funding can be done is as little as 1 week as I have money in the bank waiting for my next loan.
